rows.label: tev056401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev056401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Popote about the caravan.

rows.label: tev056401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev056401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Popote if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Popote about the caravan.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Popote about recent developments.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Popote about the food situation in New LA.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Popote about recent developments.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Popote about Earth food.

rows.label: tev056401_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Popote about recent developments.

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hold it right there! How dare friend try to steal
turf of Popote right from under nose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Popote work very hard to find this spot in Cauldros.
Spot very important supply point for Drongo Caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Popote brave dangerous enemies and cross loads of
lethal lava pits! Friend cannot just waltz in here and
stage coup when Popote did all the hard... Hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Oh, friend is doing battle with Prone? Wow! Great!
Friend should have said something sooner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Go knock those Prone silly! And talk to Pisa,
aid of Popote, if questions come up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0008
rows.name:
Grampypon of Popote is Nan, elder who leads all
Nopon on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0009
rows.name:
But grampypon acts like big coward ever since old age
set in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Tough-looking xenos come to Mira and scare pants off
grampypon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Then grampypon suddenly ditch caravan and try to
convince rest of Nopon to move to "sanctuary."
Crazy talk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0012
rows.name:
Popote has never been so embarrassed by relative
in whole life. ...Er, but friend should keep this to self.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Drongo Caravan only made it this far because of
hard work of Popote![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Pisa? Meh! Pisa is just noisy aide who likes to tell
Nopon what to do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Popote is only one with wits and courage to go on
grand adventure, braving vicious monster attacks
and setting up new caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0020
rows.name:
For weeks, poor Popote have nothing to eat but
gerrid jerky. Ah, those were the days...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Popote senses that grampypon is getting close to
major meltdown...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0026
rows.name:
For as long as Popote can remember, grampypon
made big stinks if other Nopon not fall over selves to
make grampypon happy every waking moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Be warned! If grampypon asks friend to do anything,
friend should make like garbage heap and refuse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1013
rows.name:
Every day grampypon tries to pound innermost secrets
of elderhood into brain of Popote. So tiring! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1014
rows.name:
Still, Popote happily came to human city.
Any place with this much scrumptious food is
okay by Popote![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1015
rows.name:
After tasteless fare in Cauldros, menu in New LA is like
never-ending buffet of yumminess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1016
rows.name:
Hot dogs! Pizza! Hamburgers! Popote ought to sell
them all through Nopon caravans and make killing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1020
rows.name:
Pisa sent Popote message saying "Do not come home
until Elder Nan AND Ngogo give Popote thumbs up."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1021
rows.name: Can friend believe nerve of that Nopon? Meh-meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1022
rows.name:
Pisa probably scheming to take over Drongo Caravan
or something...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1023
rows.name:
Well, Pisa can HAVE that teeny-weeny lousy excuse for
caravan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG1024
rows.name:
Once Popote takes over elder duties, Popote will
call the shots and make Pisa sorry! Mwa ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2025
rows.name:
Grampypon sent message saying to come to New LA.
Is it true that city of human friend has delicious food?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2026
rows.name:
Popote hears good things about "hot dog."
But really? Crushed entrails shoved into bread
and sprayed with blood red sauce? Meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2027
rows.name:
Popote really dodged bullet by not going anywhere
where Nopon have to eat THAT to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2032
rows.name:
Pisa sent Popote message saying "Pisa decide to
start new life in NLA. Do not come looking for Pisa!
...Popote too stupid to find Pisa anyway."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2033
rows.name:
Meeeeeeh! The nerve! Popote definitely not planning
on making effort to find ungrateful Nopon like Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2034
rows.name:
Actually, Popote is starting to get sick of all this.
Work with caravan just gets harder every day,
plus no one listen to Popote![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056401_MSG2035
rows.name: Popote seriously starting to consider options...[ST:wait ]
